text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock This government were given the genetic sequencing of covid19 mid Jan. There is no valid excuse for this piss poor rate of testing 3 months later, and you whining that he'll still be criticised is just more Tory gaslighting to the sheep who possess zero critical thinking skills.
